ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 135
ygData.msgSnippet: isn t it EASY to say you were going to be a good guy AFTER the fact? either you are an ass...or your timing is REALLY poor..in which case yur just stupid.
ygData.messageBody:
isn't it EASY to say you were going to be a "good guy" AFTER the fact?
either you are an ass...or your timing is REALLY poor..in which case yur
just stupid. woulda been more believable had you said your"roomate played a
prank on your email account to make you look a bad guy." greed consumes.
-Ranth


> From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>
